file_extensions.description: Multiple file extensions can be set separated by comma. Example: jpg,pdf.
file_extensions.title: File Extensions

path.description: If this field is not specified, this module searches the entire Dropbox
path.title: Folder

include_mounted_folders.description: Whether the results will include entries under mounted folders which includes app folder, shared folder and team folder. The default for this field is True.
include_mounted_folders.title: Include Mounted Folders

recursive.description: Whether the list folder operation will be applied recursively to all subfolders and the response will contain contents of all subfolders. The default for this field is False.
recursive.title: Recursive

include_deleted.description: Whether the results will include entries for files and folders that used to exist but were deleted. The default for this field is False.
include_deleted.title: Include Deleted

include_has_explicit_shared_members.description: Whether the results will include a flag for each file indicating whether or not that file has any explicit members. The default for this field is False.
include_has_explicit_shared_members.title: Include Shared Members

include_non_downloadable_files.description: Whether to include files that are not downloadable, i.e. Google Docs. The default for this field is True.
include_non_downloadable_files.title: Include Non Downloadable Files

anyOf.description: The destination path of file or folder
anyOf.title: To Path

anyOf.description: The new path of file or folder
anyOf.title: To Path

simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.title: Simplify

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

authentication.description: Means of authenticating with the service
authentication.title: Authentication

fileStatus.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
fileStatus.title: File Status

fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.title: File Content

binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.title: Binary File

query.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
query.title: Query

anyOf.description: The path of file or folder to copy
anyOf.title: From Path

anyOf.description: The path to delete. Can be a single file or a whole folder.
anyOf.title: Delete Path

anyOf.description: The path of file or folder to move
anyOf.title: From Path

anyOf.description: The file path of the file to download. Has to contain the full path.
anyOf.title: File Path

anyOf.description: The file path of the file to upload. Has to contain the full path. The parent folder has to exist. Existing files get overwritten.
anyOf.title: File Path

anyOf.description: The folder to create. The parent folder has to exist.
anyOf.title: Folder

anyOf.description: The path of which to list the content
anyOf.title: Folder Path
